description: Manage your PocketBase collections effortlessly. Fetch, create, update, and delete records with ease, while also handling file uploads and downloads. Streamline your database operations and enhance your application's capabilities with this powerful server.

POCKETBASE_API_URL.description: The URL of your PocketBase instance.

capabilities.name: fetch_record
capabilities.description: Fetch a single record from a PocketBase collection by ID.

capabilities.name: list_records
capabilities.description: List records from a PocketBase collection. Supports filtering, sorting, pagination, and expansion.

capabilities.name: create_record
capabilities.description: Create a new record in a PocketBase collection.

capabilities.name: update_record
capabilities.description: Update an existing record in a PocketBase collection by ID.

capabilities.name: get_collection_schema
capabilities.description: Get the schema (fields, rules, etc.) of a PocketBase collection.

capabilities.name: list_collections
capabilities.description: List all collections in the PocketBase instance.

capabilities.name: upload_file
capabilities.description: Upload a file (provided as content string) to a PocketBase collection record field.

capabilities.name: download_file
capabilities.description: Get the URL to download a file from a PocketBase collection record field.

capabilities.name: set_migrations_directory
capabilities.description: Set the directory where migration files will be created and read from.

capabilities.name: create_migration
capabilities.description: Create a new, empty PocketBase migration file with a timestamped name.

capabilities.name: create_collection_migration
capabilities.description: Create a migration file specifically for creating a new PocketBase collection.

capabilities.name: add_field_migration
capabilities.description: Create a migration file for adding a field to an existing collection.

capabilities.name: list_migrations
capabilities.description: List all migration files found in the PocketBase migrations directory.

capabilities.name: apply_migration
capabilities.description: Apply a specific migration file.

capabilities.name: revert_migration
capabilities.description: Revert a specific migration file.

capabilities.name: apply_all_migrations
capabilities.description: Apply all pending migrations.

capabilities.name: revert_to_migration
capabilities.description: Revert migrations up to a specific target.

capabilities.name: list_logs
capabilities.description: List API request logs from PocketBase with filtering, sorting, and pagination.

capabilities.name: get_log
capabilities.description: Get a single API request log by ID.

capabilities.name: get_logs_stats
capabilities.description: Get API request logs statistics with optional filtering.

capabilities.name: list_cron_jobs
capabilities.description: Returns list with all registered app level cron jobs.

capabilities.name: run_cron_job
capabilities.description: Triggers a single cron job by its id.
